title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, build and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, pull and embed calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama LLM and embeddings to chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (Open WebUI) that connects to Ollama, supports multi-user, RAG, plugins and voice.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built Node CLI that wraps ollama-js for quick chat, model listing and pulling from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot (joshpxyne/ollama-copilot)
summary: Neovim plugin that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm (ollama-helm/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin library providing typed clients and Spring Boot starter for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma.

title: ollama-cookbook (ollama-cookbook/ollama-cookbook)
summary: Community recipes for running Ollama with Docker, CUDA, M-series GPUs, FastAPI, Next.js, etc.

title: ollama-gui (stellar-amen/ollama-gui)
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app that lists and chats with any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord (rizerphe/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger-community/ollama-dagger)
summary: Dagger module to build, push and test Ollama Modelfiles inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-vscode (Chainlit/ollama-vscode)
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama-csharp/ollama-csharp)
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with typed request/response classes and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian (ollama-obsidian/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes via templates.

title: ollama-rust (ollama-rust/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client and CLI for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram (mudler/ollama-telegram)
summary: Telegram bot written in Go that streams Ollama responses and supports group chats.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as both generators and embedders for pipelines.
